page.title: 07STAMBOURNE STORES & P.O.
page.content: This is the only{shop}in the village. It sells groceries,toiletries,sweets, stationery,cigarettes,tobacco,fruit, vegetables,frozen food,ice cream and some medicines.The{mobile library} calls here once a week and the{laundry {/dry cleaning van}twice a week. A notice board is available for adverts. The shop includes a{sub-post office where one can{obtain}stamps,airletters postal orders,railcards,travellers cheques,first day covers,savings certificates,savings stamps for T.V./ vehicle licences & phone bills,dog, T.V.&C.B.licences & self-employed National Insurance stamps;{invest}in Premium/Income/Deposit Bonds;{cash} pensions & child allowances;{pay}bills by Girobank Transcash;{bank}with Savings Bank,Girobank & Leicester Building Society.{Mail} is delivered once a day & collected twice.
